title: RAZÖRFIST joins UATV
author: VD
content_html:
Unauthorized is very pleased to announce that the remorseless Razörfist has joined #UATV.

His videos, including some exclusive content, will be appearing regularly on The Rageaholic channel. If you would like to support his highly-opinionated, high-energy videos, you can do so via the monthly RazörForce subscription.
